title: Trying to reconnect issue
body:
Hi,

 I've this problem that every 2-5 minutes for 5-15 seconds, im having a small disconnect on my client and it says :"trying to reconnect".
i didnt see this happening in champ select yet but when im q'ing this can be really annoying because it just kicks me out of the q. 
tried to google it , some people here fixed this changing their DNS servers to google's public server but it didnt work for me.
i also tried contacting my ISP and they said everything looks fine. (Bezeq International)
I also tried the connection guide, so please don't send me to search there for an answer.

thanku !

replies.body:
You mentioned having gone through the steps already, but we do need to go through the steps in that [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) again as some basic troubleshooting steps first. You've already altered the DNS settings, so feel free to skip those if you want, but do pay close attention to the rest of the steps. The section on port forwarding has a good deal of success, but again, make sure to go through all of them. 

Test it in a custom game, and let me know if you're still getting those weird dc spikes. If those steps still aren't helping we can dig a little deeper with you.
